item.title: By: Mom
item.dc:creator: Mom
item.description: I, for one, am happy you didn't see any bears unless from a safe distance!!! But I feel certain you'll see many ( fishing etc. ) before this journey ends!! Good post. Most of your entries leave me feeling hungry!
item.content:encoded: I, for one, am happy you didn’t see any bears unless from a safe distance!!! But I feel certain you’ll see many ( fishing etc. ) before this journey ends!! Good post. Most of your entries leave me feeling hungry!
